location.Flavor Text: Nature wages its own war between the forest and the desert.

location.Name: Broken Edge
location.Ability:
Engaged Creatures have "Outperform Speed 5."
Damage dealt by Wisdom Attacks is reduced by 5.
location.Flavor Text: Nature wages its own war between the forest and the desert.

location.Name: Carnival of Confusion
location.Ability:
When this becomes the active Location, Creatures lose all Elemental Types. If a Creature lost Fire, it gains Water. If a Creature lost Water, it gains Air. If a Creature lost Air, it gains Earth. If a Creature lost Earth, it gains Fire.
Elemental Attacks deal an additional 5 damage.

location.Name: Carnival of Confusion
location.Ability:
When this becomes the active Location, Creatures lose all Elemental Types. If a Creature lost Fire, it gains Water. If a Creature lost Water, it gains Air. If a Creature lost Air, it gains Earth. If a Creature lost Earth, it gains Fire.
Elemental Attacks deal an additional 5 damage.

location.Name: Carnival of Confusion, Mind Games
location.Ability: When a player would draw and play an Attack Card, instead they reveal and play the top card of their Attack Deck.
location.Flavor Text: If I say I'm lying, am I telling the truth?

location.Name: Carnival of Confusion, The Entangled Throne
location.Ability: When an attack is played, flip a coin. If heads, that attack deals double damage. If tails, that attack deals 0 damage.
location.Flavor Text: Here your fate rests with your fortune.

location.Name: Castle Bodhran
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, each player can return a Mugic Card from their general discard pile to their hand.
location.Flavor Text: This strange stronghold is built in a style that might best be called "bizzarechitecture."

location.Name: Castle Bodhran
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, each player can return a Mugic Card from their general discard pile to their hand.
location.Flavor Text: This strange stronghold is built in a style that might best be called "bizzarechitecture."

location.Name: Castle Mommark
location.Ability: When this becomes the active Location, each player can sacrifice a Creature they control. If they do, they can return another Creature Card from their general discard pile to play to any unoccupied space on their side of the Battleboard.

location.Name: Castle Pillar
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, if an engaged Creature has higher Wisdom than the opposing engaged Creature, put a Mugic counter on it.

location.Name: Castle Pillar
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, if an engaged Creature has higher Wisdom than the opposing engaged Creature, put a Mugic counter on it.

location.Name: Castle Pillar (OP)
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, if an engaged Creature has higher Wisdom than the opposing engaged Creature, put a Mugic counter on it
location.Flavor Text: It's rumored that the most vicious creature in Perim is imprisoned here, but only Chaor truly knows.

location.Name: Castle Rathwaq
location.Ability: The engaged Creature with the lowest Power deals 5 less damage with attacks.
location.Flavor Text: Grotesquely beautiful, the design is as twisted as its inhabitants.

location.Name: Catacombs of the Conjurors
location.Ability:
Damage dealt to Warbeast Creatures by Recklessness is reduced by 5.
Conjuror Creatures have "Recklessness 5."
location.Flavor Text: Shunned by even the most tolerant of Mipedians, Conjurors continue to push the boundaries of Mugic.

location.Name: Chamber of Waves
location.Ability: Creatures have 10 less in all Disciplines.
location.Flavor Text: As corrupted water flows through the pipes of the gigantic acoustic organ, a sound resonates that is both eerie, beautiful and inexplicably dangerous.

location.Name: City of Kehn-sep, Tablet Dig Site
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, each player reveals the top 2 cards of their Attack Deck. Any player who reveals 3 or more total Build Points in Attack Cards puts 2 Mugic counters on their engaged Creature. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of the Attack Deck in any order.

location.Name: Cordac Falls
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, engaged Creatures gains 5 Energy.
location.Flavor Text: Cordac's teardrops plunge into the abyss with nary a splash or spray...

location.Name: Cordac Falls Plungepool
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, deal 5 damage to engaged Creatures.
location.Flavor Text: ...and strike the lake miles below, exploding outwards into the fray.

location.Name: Cryomorph Barricades
location.Ability:
Creatures with Defender deal an additional 5 attack damage. 
Mirage: Creatures in this space have "Defender."
location.Flavor Text: Even Intress was flabbergasted that the Fluidmorphers built the wall in a day.

location.Name: Crystal Cave
location.Ability: If an engaged Creature has lower Speed than the opposing engaged Creature, it deals 0 damage on its first attack each combat.
location.Flavor Text: The ancient Mugicians mined the hardest substance in all of Perim to protect their mystical melodies.

location.Name: Deadrange Gong
location.Ability: Chieftain Creatures have an additional 15 in all Disciplines and "Water 5."
location.Flavor Text: Reverberating throughout the deep, M'arrillians can also receive commands by sensing vibrations in the water.

location.Name: Doors of the Deepmines
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, Creatures with Water gain 10 Energy.
location.Flavor Text: In a rare sign of solidarity, all four tribes guard the massive doors, hoping they never open again.

location.Name: Dranakis Threshold
location.Ability: Mugic and activated abilities cannot be played.
location.Flavor Text: The few who have survived utter nary a word of what lies beyond.

location.Name: Dranakis Threshold
location.Ability: Mugic and activated abilities cannot be played.
location.Flavor Text: The few who have survived utter nary a word of what lies beyond.

location.Name: Dranakis Threshold, Portal to the Past
location.Ability:
Creatures are considered Past Creatures.
Creatures have no Tribes.
location.Flavor Text: The past, present and future all converge here.

location.Name: Elmantiir
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, engaged Creatures gain 5 Energy for each Elemental Type they have.
location.Flavor Text: As the Elmantiir manifested, Intress knew that she would win - the Emperors of the Elements had bestowed their might upon her.

location.Name: Everrain
location.Ability:
Water attacks deal an additional 5 damage.
Damage dealt by Earth attacks is reduced by 5.
location.Flavor Text: Lake Ken-I-Po seeps through the UnderWorld ceiling in an unending reminder of the OverWorld's aqueous bounty.

location.Name: Eye of the Maelstrom
location.Ability: When this becomes the active Location, each player discards a Mugic Card.
location.Flavor Text: No wind, no sound - just madness.

location.Name: Fear Valley
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, if an engaged Creature has lower Courage than the opposing engaged Creature, it loses 10 Energy.
location.Flavor Text: One night here means a lifetime of nightmares.

location.Name: Fear Valley (OP)
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, if an engaged Creature has lower Courage than the opposing engaged Creature, it loses 10 Energy.
location.Flavor Text: No matter how far you run, you can never escape a nightmare.

location.Name: Foothold Assault Trench
location.Ability: If all Creatures a player controls share a Tribe, that player's engaged Creature deals an additional 5 attack damage.

location.Name: Forest of Life
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, if an engaged Creature has higher Power than the opposing engaged Creature, it gains 5 Energy.
location.Flavor Text: A place of perpetuity: nothing is born or perishes within.

location.Name: Forest of Life, During Aichlyys
location.Ability: Creatures do not have and cannot gain Invisibility.
location.Flavor Text: On those rare nights when the triad stars of Lup, Lec, and Teo shine above the forest, all secrets are brought to light.

location.Name: Frozen Fire
location.Ability: When a Creature has a Mugic counter put on it or removed from it, deal 5 damage to it.
location.Flavor Text: The ocean of flames chills as it burns.

location.Name: Gambreor's Hut
location.Ability:
Creatures you control have "Fireproof 5."
If a Creature's Discipline would decrease, that Discipline decreases by 10 less instead.

location.Name: Gigantempopolis
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, put a Mugic counter on any engaged OverWorld Creatures.
location.Flavor Text: The ancient beings who once dwelled here faded into oblivion - proving indisputably that size doesn’t matter.

location.Name: Gigantempopolis, Chamber of the Oraklon
location.Ability: Each Battlegear has "Untargetable."
location.Flavor Text: Since the Oraklon allows one to peer into distant lands, it is no wonder the giants guarded it so closely... or that Vlar wanted it so badly!

location.Name: Glacier Plains
location.Ability: Creatures must pay an additional Mugic counter to play UnderWorld Mugic Cards.
location.Flavor Text: This frozen, remote region is as harsh and forbidding as the UnderWorld's Lava Pond.

location.Name: Glacier Plains (Holiday Reward)
location.Ability: UnderWorld Mugic Costs 1 additional Mugic Counter to play.
location.Flavor Text: This frozen, remote region is home to Blügon and other frosty Creatures.

location.Name: Glacier Plains, M'arrillian Heat Cannon
location.Ability: Remove 50 Mugic counters from among Creatures you control: Win the game. Any player can play this ability.
location.Flavor Text:
"If the ice melts, Perim will die. We must stop it... no matter what the sacrifice." 
—Tangath Toborn

location.Name: Glacier Plains, M'arrillian Melting Camp
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, each player can remove two Mugic counters from any Creatures they control. If a player does not, their engaged Creature loses 50 in each Discipline.

location.Name: Gloom-mire Night
location.Ability: Creatures cannot be relocated by Mugic, abilities or Attacks.
location.Flavor Text: As Bodal sank into the murky swamp, he calculated that he had 45.7 seconds until he would be gargling black ooze.

location.Name: Gloomuck Swamp
location.Ability:
Earth attacks deal an additional 5 damage.
Damage dealt by Fire attacks is reduced by 5.
location.Flavor Text: For very different reasons both Crawsectus and Antidaeon choose to call this murky mess home.

location.Name: Gorram's Briefing
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, engaged Creatures gains 5 Energy and 5 to all Disciplines for each Tribe its controller controls.
location.Flavor Text: The beginning of the end begins.

location.Name: Gothos Tower
location.Ability:
Creatures not named Lord Van Bloot have 10 less Courage.
Lord Van Bloot has "Invisibility: Strike 15."
location.Flavor Text: The horrific home of the harrowing Lord Van Bloot.

location.Name: Graalorn Forest
location.Ability: When an Elemental Attack is played by a Creature, heal 5 damage to it.
location.Flavor Text: The heart of the forest exhales, breathing life into those injured.

location.Name: Grand Hall of Muge's Summit
location.Ability: When a Mugic counter is removed from a Creature, Grand Hall of Muge's Summit deals 10 damage to the engaged Creature controlled by the same player.
location.Flavor Text: Muges rarely feel comfortable sharing their secrets.

location.Name: Hall of Fatigue
location.Ability: Engaged Creatures have "Exhaust Power 5" and "Exhaust Speed 5."
location.Flavor Text: When the body has nothing left to give, only the strong-willed fight on.

location.Name: Herken's Feast
location.Ability: The first attack played by a Creature each combat is reduced by 20 damage.
location.Flavor Text: The sumptuous meal would have thrilled royalty, but the guests had more important matters to digest.

location.Name: Ijahni Outpost
location.Ability:
Your Creatures have 10 less Energy. 
Mirage: Creatures cannot move off this space unless their controller removes a Mugic counter from any Creature they control.

location.Name: Illusionary Lake
location.Ability:
Engaged Creatures do not have Water and cannot gain it.
Mirage: Creatures in this space do not have Water and cannot gain it.

location.Name: Imaginary Walls
location.Ability:
When this becomes the active Location, your opponent can return a Mugic Card in their general discard pile to their hand.
Attacks deal 10 less damage to Creatures that are a M'arrillian or a Minion.

location.Name: Indigo Grove
location.Ability: When this becomes the active Location, you can sacrifice a non-Conjuror Creature you control. If you do, return a Conjuror Creature Card in your general discard pile to play to any unoccupied space on the Battleboard.

location.Name: Iparu Jungle
location.Ability:
When this becomes the active Location, flip a coin. If tails, shuffle Iparu Jungle into its controller's Location Deck and that player reveals a new active Location.
Mirage: At the beginning of combat, each engaged Creature in this space gains or loses Energy so its Energy is equal to its Scanned Energy.

location.Name: Iron Pillar
location.Ability: Battlegear have no abilities.
location.Flavor Text: The frequent quakes that rock the UnderWorld are blamed on the instability of this once-might prop.

location.Name: Iron Pillar
location.Ability: Battlegear have no abilities.
location.Flavor Text: The frequent quakes that rock the UnderWorld are blamed on the instability of this once-might prop.

location.Name: Jade Pillar
location.Ability:
When this becomes the active Location, put 10 Jade counters on it. As an attack deals damage, remove 1 Jade counter for each 5 damage dealt.
When the last counter is removed, Jade Pillar deals 50 damage to the Creature that played the last attack.

location.Name: Kaizeph, City of the Elements
location.Ability: Creatures take 5 less damage from attacks they share an Elemental Type with.
location.Flavor Text: Unlike all else, the Citadel is the foundation of everything.

location.Name: Khybon's Scrapyard
location.Ability: When a Battlegear is put into a general discard pile, put a Scrap counter on Khybon's Scrapyard. Then, if it has three or more Scrap counters, return up to one Battlegear Card from your general discard pile to play equipped to an unequipped Creature you control and your opponent reveals a new active Location.

location.Name: Kiru City
location.Ability: OverWorld Creatures have an additional 10 Energy.
location.Flavor Text: The majestic capital of the OverWorld is named in memory of one of its greatest leaders.

location.Name: Kiru City (OP)
location.Ability: OverWorld Creatures have an additional 10 Energy.
location.Flavor Text:
"We will rebuild our home on the ruins of Old Kiru. The UnderWorlders may have destroyed our city, but they can never destroy our spirit!" 
—Maxxor

location.Name: Kiru City Tunnels
location.Ability:
Creatures with 35 or more Scanned Energy deal 10 less attack damage.
When any player shuffles their Attack Deck, that player reveals a new active Location.

location.Name: Kiru Village
location.Ability: Past Creatures have an additional 10 Energy.
location.Flavor Text:
"Yes, Chaor's ancestor was one of the greatest OverWorlders of all time. I'm proud he was my friend, despite what he ultimately became." 
—Najarin

location.Name: Lake Blakeer
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, engaged M'arrillian Creatures lose 10 Energy. Engaged M'arrillian Creatures named Aa'une gain 20 Energy instead.
location.Flavor Text: The legend forged here will last for generations.

location.Name: Lake Ken-I-Po
location.Ability: Each Mugic has "Untargetable."
location.Flavor Text: Above the placid waters, Najarin's castle towers. A dim light flickers... and a mystery is born.

location.Name: Lake Ken-I-Po, Ritual Site
location.Ability: Creatures cannot gain or lose Elemental Types from Mugic, Attacks or abilities.
location.Flavor Text: As the towers emerged, all wondered what more lay bellow the surface.

location.Name: Lake Morn, Globe Storm
location.Ability: When this becomes the active Location, flip a coin. If heads, Creatures with Water take an additional 5 attack damage. If tails, Creatures with Water take 5 less attack damage.

location.Name: Lava Pond
location.Ability:
Fire attacks deal an additional 5 damage.
Damage dealt by Air attacks is reduced by 5.
Creatures named Magmon have "Fire 5."

location.Name: Lava Pond, Milla'iin's Foothold
location.Ability:
When this becomes the active Location, each player reveals a random Mugic Card from their hand.
Cards with the same name as the revealed cards cannot be played.
Creatures that are a M'arrillian or a Minion take 5 less non-attack damage .

location.Name: Lore's Chamber of Recall
location.Ability:
When this becomes the active Location, remove all cards in each general discard pile from the game.
Mirage: At the beginning of combat, engaged Creatures in this space with 30 or less Scanned Energy gain 30 Energy.

location.Name: M'arrillian Pulse Beacons
location.Ability: When this becomes the active Location, flip all face-up Battlegear face-down.
location.Flavor Text: The M'arrillians need not be present to make their presence felt.

location.Name: Mipedian Dew Farm
location.Ability:
Scouts have Water.
Engaged Creatures with Water have "{{MC}}: Heal 10 damage to target Creature."
location.Flavor Text: Under the sun, one drop is the difference between life and death.

location.Name: Mipedim Lounge
location.Ability: Mirage: When an Attack Card is played by a Creature in this space, its controller can flip a coin. If tails, that player sacrifices his engaged Creature. If heads, the attack deals an additional 10 damage, and that player can flip again.

location.Name: Mipedim Lounge
location.Ability: Mirage: When an Attack Card is played by a Creature in this space, its controller can flip a coin. If tails, that player sacrifices his engaged Creature. If heads, the attack deals an additional 10 damage, and that player can flip again.

location.Name: Mipedim Mirage
location.Ability:
Creatures have "Swift 1."
Mirage: If an adjacent Creature can move into this space, it must do so.
location.Flavor Text: No one believed what the Muges saw, except for Tiaane.

location.Name: Mipedim Oasis
location.Ability: Mipedian Creatures deal an additional 10 damage with their first attack each combat.
location.Flavor Text: For those struggling in the Mipedian Desert, this is a welcome sight. But it is what they can't see that will prove most dangerous.

location.Name: Mipedim Tropics
location.Ability: Mipedian Creatures have Water and "Water 5."
location.Flavor Text: Though widely dismissed as anomalies, the first minuscule desert patches were signs that paradise was not forever.

location.Name: Mipedim Valley
location.Ability: Battlegear equipped to Creatures without Air is not flipped face-up at the beginning of combat.
location.Flavor Text: Some Mipedians yearn for a home from the unforgiving desert. And they may have just found it.

location.Name: Mommark's Catapult Tower
location.Ability: When this becomes the active Location, Creatures you control gain "Swift 1."

location.Name: Mount Pillar
location.Ability: When this becomes the active Location, activate Hive.
location.Flavor Text: The Danian homeland provides vital structural support to the UnderWorld ceiling, explaining why Chaor has resisted its demolition.

location.Name: Mount Pillar Reservoir
location.Ability:
Creatures have "Fireproof 10."
Danian Creatures have "Water 5."
location.Flavor Text: All Danians know that the Reservoir is the well-spring of life. It must be defended to the death.

location.Name: Mount Pillar Reservoir, Liberated
location.Ability: When this becomes the active Location, each player Infects an Uninfected Creature they control.
location.Flavor Text: The Danians' lifeblood is also the root of the Mipedians' hatred.

location.Name: Mount Pillar Reservoir, Neth'uar's Foothold
location.Ability:
When this becomes the active Location, each player can return a Chieftain Creature Card from their general discard pile to play to any unoccupied space on their side of the Battleboard. 
Creatures that are a M'arrillian or a Minion have "Water 5."

location.Name: Najarin's Castle
location.Ability: When this becomes the active Location, each player can discard a Mugic Card. If they do, they can return a Mugic Card from their general discard pile to their hand.

location.Name: Numin Voidland
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, engaged Creatures lose all Elemental Types and gain 10 Energy for each Elemental Type lost this way.
location.Flavor Text: Nothing survives here, not even the M'arrillians themselves!

location.Name: Oipont's Lookout
location.Ability:
Creatures with Air have Earth.
If Hive is Active, Danian Creatures have Air and Earth.
location.Flavor Text: From high above, Danians can see deep into the heart of the UnderWorld, including invading armies days in advance.

location.Name: Open Doors of the Deepmines
location.Ability: Minion Creatures are treated as if their controller also controlled a Chieftain.
location.Flavor Text:
"Prepare yourselves! This is the nightmare I foretold!" 
—Najarin

location.Name: OverWorld Embassy at Mount Pillar
location.Ability:
When this becomes the active Location, shuffle any Mirage Locations in play into their controllers' Location Decks. 
Mipedian Creatures have Water.
location.Flavor Text: Its outward tranquility masks the tumult within.

location.Name: Pouril Forest
location.Ability: Creatures do not have and cannot gain Defender.
location.Flavor Text: The most peaceful place in Perim... until Yokkis shows up and slaps a pie in your face!

location.Name: Prexxor Chasm
location.Ability: At the beginning of the turn, choose a Creature your opponent controls and they choose a Creature you control. Relocate your Creature into the opposing Creature's space and begin combat. This does not count toward your one combat per turn.

location.Name: Prexxor Chasm, The Blight
location.Ability:
Non-Caretaker Creatures cannot be healed or gain Energy from non-innate abilities.
Mirage: Creatures in this space have 20 less Energy.
location.Flavor Text: Forever insatiable, The Blight consumes all.

location.Name: Prototype Demolition Field
location.Ability: When a Creature deals 20 or more damage with its first attack each combat, destroy all Battlegear equipped to it.
location.Flavor Text: Finish first? I'm more worried about finishing in one piece!

location.Name: Psi-fanger's Shelf
location.Ability:
When an Attack Card would be placed in an Attack Discard pile, instead place it on the bottom of its controller's Attack Deck.
When a player would draw an Attack Card, instead they return an Attack Card in their Attack Discard pile to their hand.
If any Attack Discard pile is empty, reveal a new active Location.

location.Name: Psikoom Madness Chamber
location.Ability: Engaged Creatures have "Exhaust  Courage 5" and "Exhaust Wisdom 5."
location.Flavor Text: The lucky ones go insane.

location.Name: Pyrogenousist's Hearth
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, deal 10 damage to each engaged Creature with no Mugic counters on them.

location.Name: Quarters of the Quartet
location.Ability: While a player controls exactly four Tribes, that player's Creatures have "Untargetable by opponents."
location.Flavor Text: Four minds, one heart, Perim forever.

location.Name: Queen's Gate
location.Ability: Creatures engaged with Scouts do not have and cannot gain Invisibility.
location.Flavor Text: "Did you hear something moving? Did you see something moving? I think I just touched something moving..."

location.Name: Rao'Pa Sahkk, Condensation Ceremony
location.Ability: Creatures without Water cannot spend Mugic counters to play Mugic or abilities.
location.Flavor Text: Fluidmorphers can manipulate all water, from vast oceans to individual droplets of vapor.

location.Name: Rao'Pa Sahkk, Ihun'kalin's Foothold
location.Ability:
When this becomes the active Location, each player sacrifices a Battlegear.
When a M'arrillian or Minion Creature wins a Challenge on an Attack it plays, that Creature gains 5 Energy.

location.Name: Rao'Pa Sahkk, The Ocean with No Water
location.Ability:
Attacks that are either Air or Earth deal an additional 5 damage. (Attacks which are both Air and Earth deal only 5 additional damage.)
When a Water attack is played, that attack's controller reveals a new active Location.
Mirage: At the end of combat, put a Mugic counter on engaged Creatures in this space.

location.Name: Ravanaugh Ridge
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, if a player controls an engaged Creature with Air, that player can look at the top three cards of their Attack Deck, put one of them on top of that deck and the others on the bottom in any order.

location.Name: Riverlands
location.Ability: When a Creature deals Water damage, heal 5 damage to it.
location.Flavor Text: No one has yet to reach the source of the rushing waters. Could the Cothica be where it all begins?

location.Name: Riverlands, Abandoned Wastes
location.Ability: When this becomes the active Location, each player shuffles their attack hand into their Attack Deck and draws two Attack Cards.

location.Name: Riverlands, Erak'tabb's Foothold
location.Ability:
When this becomes the active Location, each player removes a Mugic counter from a Creature they control.
Attacks deal 5 less damage to Creatures that are a M'arrillian or a Minion.

location.Name: Rock River Canyon
location.Ability: Creatures with Earth have an additional 10 Energy.
location.Flavor Text: A metaphor for patience: just one tiny stream carved the land into a canyon over the course of a thousand generations.

location.Name: Royal Mipedian Academy of Melee Arts
location.Ability:
Non-attack damage is reduced to 0. 
Mirage: Creatures in this space cannot be targeted by Mugic.
location.Flavor Text: Trust not blades, for they break. Trust not shields, for they shatter. Trust only yourself, who can neither break nor shatter.

location.Name: Runic Grove
location.Ability: Tribal Mugic cannot be played.
location.Flavor Text: Secret symbols or a simple secret? Many have been tantalized by what remains indecipherable to this day.

location.Name: Sands of the Unseen
location.Ability: Creatures with Air have "Invisibility: Strike 10."
location.Flavor Text: Danians seek the answers to Mipedian invisibility, but they realize too late that some secrets should remain mysteries.

location.Name: Sha-Kree Flats
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, engaged Elementalist Creatures gain an Elemental type of their controller's choice.
location.Flavor Text: Flat, dry, inhospitable. Perfect!

location.Name: Sha-Kree Flats
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, engaged Elementalist Creatures gain an Elemental type of their controller's choice.
location.Flavor Text: Flat, dry, inhospitable. Perfect!

location.Name: Shardcrafters' Workshop
location.Ability:
Shard Battlegear have "Equipped Creature deals an additional 5 attack damage."
Battlegear cannot be flipped face-down.
location.Flavor Text: Kha'rall are nearly unstoppable. The shards guarantee that they are.

location.Name: Silchaw's Mine
location.Ability: Attacks that would deal more than 20 damage to Creatures with Earth deal 20 damage instead.
location.Flavor Text: Since Aszil opened the Tremor Gate, the very bedrock of Silchaw's mine has gone mad!

location.Name: Siril'ean's Lair
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, if a player has fewer Mugic Cards in hand than the number of Creatures they control, that player discards a Mugic Card.

location.Name: Skeletal Springs
location.Ability:
Creatures with Water have "Water 5." 
Fluidmorpher Creatures cannot have Mugic counters put on them or use Mugic counters to pay for Mugic or abilities.

location.Name: Star Towers of Kehn-sep
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, if an engaged Creature has higher Wisdom than the opposing engaged Creature, that Creature's controller can remove a Mugic counter from a Creature they control. If they do, they can put a Mugic counter on a Creature they control.

location.Name: Stone Pillar
location.Ability: Engaged UnderWorld Creatures pay 1 less Mugic counter to play their first Mugic this turn.
location.Flavor Text: Without the Pillars there would be no Over and Under, but simply one World.

location.Name: Stormgrounds
location.Ability: Minion Creatures' activated abilities cost an additional Mugic counter to play.
location.Flavor Text: The lightning storm has raged for hundreds of years... and will continue to do so long after every creature is gone.

location.Name: Stronghold Morn
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, engaged Creatures gain Fire, Water, Air, and Earth.

location.Name: Stronghold Morn
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, engaged Creatures gain Fire, Water, Air, and Earth.

location.Name: Tablet Sanctuary
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, put a Mugic counter on the engaged Creature with the most Elemental types.
location.Flavor Text: Though the tablet answered many long-debated questions, not every creature liked the answers.

location.Name: The Barracks
location.Ability: At the end of combat, if a Warrior you control was engaged that combat, you can relocate it to any unoccupied space on the Battleboard adjacent to it.
location.Flavor Text: Rest well tonight. Another harsh day awaits.

location.Name: The Cliffs
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, all Creatures gain Earth.
location.Flavor Text: No matter how hard they tried, the Danians could not win the staring contest.

location.Name: The Coralsmithy
location.Ability: When an attack that has both Fire and Water is played by a Creature, its controller can swap one of that Creature's Battlegear with a Battlegear Card in its controller's general discard pile.

location.Name: The Darkened Dunes
location.Ability: Creatures with Earth have "Range" and "Swift 1."
location.Flavor Text: The dark whirlwind descends, enveloping you in its black, velvet grip... and never lets go.

location.Name: The Darkened Dunes
location.Ability: Creatures with Earth have "Range" and "Swift 1."
location.Flavor Text: The dark whirlwind descends, enveloping you in its black, velvet grip... and never lets go.

location.Name: The Flame Gate
location.Ability: All attacks count as Fire attacks.
location.Flavor Text:
"Maybe we should look for another way in." 
—Mezzmarr

location.Name: The Garden
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, all Creatures gain Water.
location.Flavor Text: Water is life.

location.Name: The Golden Heptagon
location.Ability: Creatures can play Mugic of any Tribe or affiliation.
location.Flavor Text: At the base of the Citadel, a golden room offers its visitors a taste of an elusive dream...

location.Name: The Heart of the Jungle
location.Ability:
If one engaged Creature would increase or decrease its Disciplines, both engaged Creatures increases or decreases those Disciplines instead.
Mirage: Creatures in this space have an additional 10 in all Disciplines.

location.Name: The Hive Gallery
location.Ability:
Engaged Creatures have "Outperform Courage 5." 
Damage dealt by Power Attacks is reduced by 5.
location.Flavor Text: As long as we never forget the fallen, they will live forever.

location.Name: The Hive Gallery
location.Ability:
Engaged Creatures have "Outperform Courage 5." 
Damage dealt by Power Attacks is reduced by 5.
location.Flavor Text: As long as we never forget the fallen, they will live forever.

location.Name: The Hunter's Perimeter
location.Ability:
When this becomes the active Location, Mipedian Creatures gain "Invisibility: Surprise."
At the beginning of combat, reveal a new active Location.
Mirage: Creatures in this space cannot lose Invisibility from Mugic or abilities. Invisibility abilities of Creatures in this space work against Creatures with Invisibility.

location.Name: The Infectorium
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, deal 15 damage to Infected engaged non-Danian Creatures.
location.Flavor Text: As the breeding ground of millions of parasites, Danians can infect every creature in Perim a hundred times over.

location.Name: The Magma Dam
location.Ability: Creatures without Fire have "Recklessness 5."
location.Flavor Text:
"It only needs to hold until Chaor's hordes have amassed!" 
—Khybon

location.Name: The Northrange, Highground
location.Ability:
When this becomes the active Location, choose a Tribe. All Creatures also count as that Tribe.
Mirage: Creatures in this space count as all Tribes.

location.Name: The Oligarch's Path
location.Ability:
Chieftain Creatures have an additional 10 Energy.
Creatures pay 4 less Mugic counters to play Mugic named Calling of Aa'une.
location.Flavor Text: Najarin's visions were getting more disturbing. How could the worst be still to come?!?

location.Name: The OverWorld Library
location.Ability:
Engaged Creatures have "Outperform Wisdom 5."
Damage dealt by Courage Attacks is reduced by 5.
location.Flavor Text: From cookbooks to Cothica clues, every book written is within.

location.Name: The OverWorld Library
location.Ability:
Engaged Creatures have "Outperform Wisdom 5."
Damage dealt by Courage Attacks is reduced by 5.
location.Flavor Text: From cookbooks to Cothica clues, every book written is within.

location.Name: The Passage, OverWorld
location.Ability: The first time a Creature gains an Elemental Type this turn, it gains 10 Energy.
location.Flavor Text: From the warm rays of the inviting sun, the stairs spiral into chilling darkness...

location.Name: The Passage, UnderWorld
location.Ability: The first time a Creature loses an Elemental Type this turn, it loses 10 Energy.
location.Flavor Text: ...plunging into the void until a faint glow illuminates from bellow, a light not so inviting.

location.Name: The Phalanx Portcullis
location.Ability:
Creatures with less than 50 Courage deal 5 less attack damage.
Creatures with more than 100 Courage deal an additional 5 attack damage.

location.Name: The Phlogiston
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, all Creatures gain Fire.
location.Flavor Text: The land melts, boils and erupts, creating an ever-shifting landscape.

location.Name: The Pits
location.Ability:
Engaged Creatures have "Outperform Power 5."
Damage dealt by Speed Attacks is reduced by 5.
location.Flavor Text: The UnderWorlders are fair - all are guilty until proven innocent.

location.Name: The Pits
location.Ability:
Engaged Creatures have "Outperform Power 5."
Damage dealt by Speed Attacks is reduced by 5.
location.Flavor Text: The UnderWorlders are fair - all are guilty until proven innocent.

location.Name: The Rao'Pa Sahkk Chimegrid
location.Ability: When this becomes the active Location, each player puts a Mugic counter on a Creature they control.
location.Flavor Text: The sound reverberated far and wide - the Song of Doom!

location.Name: The Storm Tunnel
location.Ability:
Air attacks deal an additional 5 damage.
Damage dealt by Water attacks is reduced by 5.
location.Flavor Text: Even those who cannot fly do so here.

location.Name: The Storm Tunnel, Flooding
location.Ability:
Engaged Creatures have "Water 5."
Creatures with Air that became engaged this turn have an additional 10 Energy.
location.Flavor Text: The air drowns, the sky cries, the winds cease, the hope dies.

location.Name: The Storm Tunnel, Ki'bro's Foothold
location.Ability:
All attacks also count as Water attacks.
Damage dealt by Air attacks is reduced by 5.
location.Flavor Text: Fighting the war on many fronts stretches even the M'arrillians to their limits.

location.Name: The Storm Tunnel, Lingering Monsoon
location.Ability: The engaged Creature with the lowest Speed plays attacks at random.
location.Flavor Text: The scars of war remain long after the battle is over.

location.Name: The Storms
location.Ability: At the beginning of combat, all Creatures gain Air.
location.Flavor Text:
"Someone must have carved these statues. So where are they?" 
—Tiaane

location.Name: The Swartbron
location.Ability: The engaged Creature with the lowest Courage fails all Checks on attacks it plays.
location.Flavor Text: Night flows like a river here.

location.Name: The Training Grounds
location.Ability:
At the beginning of combat, deal 5 damage to each engaged Creature for each Mugic counter on that Creature.
When a Creature wins combat, put Mugic counters on that Creature equal to its Mugic Ability.

location.Name: Ulmar's Projection Cavern
location.Ability:
When this becomes the active Location, your opponent reveals a new active Location.
Mirage: At the beginning of each player's turn, if this space is unoccupied, that player can relocate one of their Creatures to this space on the Battleboard.

location.Name: UnderWorld City
location.Ability: Attacks played by UnderWorld Creatures have "Challenge Power 15: Deal 5 damage."
location.Flavor Text: Not known for his creativity, Chaor nevertheless won the capital-naming contest for which he was also the judge.

location.Name: UnderWorld City, During Van Bloot's Ascent
location.Ability:
Creatures not named Lord Van Bloot have 10 less Courage.
Attack Cards played by Minion Creatures have "Challenge Courage 15: Deal 5 damage."

location.Name: UnderWorld Colosseum
location.Ability: Creatures with Fire deal an additional 10 damage on their first attack each combat.
location.Flavor Text: UnderWorlders have a simple way of settling arguments here: the one left standing is always right.

location.Name: Van Bloot's Banquet
location.Ability:
Creatures that are a M'arrillian or a Minion have an additional 5 Energy.
When your engaged Creature loses Initiative, it gains 20 to all Disciplines.
location.Flavor Text: A toast to my new friends! Together, we'll overthrow Chaor!

location.Name: Vidav's Refectorium
location.Ability: When this becomes the active Location, each player draws two Attack Cards, then discards two Attack Cards.
location.Flavor Text: Though Vidav wants peace, his battle tactics are undeniably the best.

location.Name: Vidav's Refectorium
location.Ability: When this becomes the active Location, each player draws two Attack Cards, then discards two Attack Cards.
location.Flavor Text: Though Vidav wants peace, his battle tactics are undeniably the best.

location.Name: Wooden Pillar
location.Ability: Creatures must pay an additional Mugic counter to play OverWorld Mugic Cards.
location.Flavor Text: The Runic Grove takes root here, and UnderWorlders believe it grows even further down than up.

location.Ability: When this becomes the active Location, Uninfect all Creatures.
location.Flavor Text: Though adorned with oah and jij plants from his village, one look outside his window reminds Raznus that he's far from home.

mugic.Name: Canon of Casualty
mugic.Ability: Deal 20 damage to target Creature.
mugic.Flavor Text: Even before the first three notes finish playing, OverWorlders scramble for the nearest shelter.

mugic.Name: Cascade Symphony
mugic.Ability: Damage dealt to target Creature by Fire or Air attacks is reduced by 5. (An attack which is both Fire and Air is still reduced by 5.)
mugic.Flavor Text: "There is but one true language, and that is Mugic. All else is gibberish." - Donmar

mugic.Name: Chorus of the Hive
mugic.Ability: Activate Hive.
mugic.Flavor Text: What repels some attracts others. Is preference learned or ingrained?

mugic.Name: Decrescendo
mugic.Ability: Deal 5 damage to target Creature.
mugic.Flavor Text: Minimalism to the max.

mugic.Name: Discord of Disarming
mugic.Ability: Destroy target Battlegear.
mugic.Flavor Text: As his Windstrider decomposes into shrapnel, Bodal calculates that it will take 56.4 seconds before he splats on the ground.

mugic.Name: Ember Flourish
mugic.Ability: Heal 15 damage to target Creature with Air or Fire.
mugic.Flavor Text: No matter how many you carry with you, a song can never weigh you down.

mugic.Name: Fanfare of the Vanishing
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains "Invisibility: Strike 15."
mugic.Flavor Text: When a melody becomes memory, it will never disappear.

mugic.Name: Fortissimo
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains 5 Courage, Power, Wisdom, Speed, and Energy.
mugic.Flavor Text: Large is good. Larger is better. But really, really big is sometimes best.

mugic.Name: Geo Flourish
mugic.Ability: Heal 15 damage to target Creature with Earth or Water.
mugic.Flavor Text: Protect the land and the land will protect you.

mugic.Name: Hymn of the Elements
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains an Elemental Type of your choice.
mugic.Flavor Text: All elements stem from nature—as does the Cothica itself.

mugic.Name: Interlude of Consequence
mugic.Ability: Shuffle target player's Attack Deck or Location Deck.
mugic.Flavor Text: In desperate situations, turmoil and confusion can be one's allies.

mugic.Name: Melody of Malady
mugic.Ability: Target engaged Creature gains 10 Energy. Deal 5 damage to another target engaged Creature.
mugic.Flavor Text:
"A little bit more for me, a little bit less for you. Perfect!"
—Zalvar

mugic.Name: Melody of Mirage
mugic.Ability: Target attack deals 0 damage.
mugic.Flavor Text: Trust your ears, not your eyes.

mugic.Name: Minor Flourish
mugic.Ability: Heal 10 damage to target Creature.
mugic.Flavor Text:
"Anyone can imitate a melody, but to hear it in one's head for the very first time... that is a gift." 
—Najarin

mugic.Name: Mugic Reprise
mugic.Ability: Return target Mugic Card from your general discard pile to your hand.
mugic.Flavor Text: Everything that was once lost will be found again.

mugic.Name: Notes of Neverwhere
mugic.Ability: The active Location loses all abilities.
mugic.Flavor Text:
"If you have all that you need, you are always home." 
—From an ancient Mugician text

mugic.Name: OverWorld Aria
mugic.Ability: Heal 10 damage to target OverWorld Creature. Damage dealt to that Creature by Fire attacks is reduced by 5.
mugic.Flavor Text: Mugicians choose host Creatures along tribe affiliations.

mugic.Name: Refrain of Denial
mugic.Ability: Negate target Mugic.
mugic.Flavor Text: Cacophony signaled the beginning of the end of peace for the Mugicians.

mugic.Name: Refrain of Denial, (OverWorld)
mugic.Ability: Negate target Generic or OverWorld Mugic.
mugic.Flavor Text:
"No such thing as Mugicians! Now fight!" 
—Dardemus

mugic.Name: Refrain of Denial, (OverWorld/UnderWorld)
mugic.Ability: Negate target OverWorld or UnderWorld Mugic.
mugic.Flavor Text:
"The secret to using Mugic is to not try to solve its mysteries." 
—Lore

mugic.Name: Song of Asperity
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains "Fire 5" and "Air 5."
mugic.Flavor Text: When anger is all-consuming, hatred is the gateway to a hideous power.

mugic.Name: Song of Deflection
mugic.Ability: Change the target of target Mugic or ability with a single target.
mugic.Flavor Text: Beauty is in the ears of the beholder - even discordant notes sound harmonious in dire situations.

mugic.Name: Song of EmberNova
mugic.Ability: Deal 10 damage to target Creature with Air or Fire.
mugic.Flavor Text: Fire consumes air, suffocating the earth.

mugic.Name: Song of Focus
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains 10 Courage, Power, Wisdom, and Speed.

mugic.Name: Song of Fury
mugic.Ability: Deal 10 damage to target Creature. Another target Creature gains "Fire 5."
mugic.Flavor Text:
"My legs or my Mugician? There is no choice. Cut them off!" 
—Miklon

mugic.Name: Song of Futuresight
mugic.Ability: Look at the top two cards of target player's Attack Deck or Location Deck. Put one of them on top of that deck and the other on the bottom.
mugic.Flavor Text: Take care when peering into the future. Sometimes it is best to not know what comes.

mugic.Name: Song of GeoNova
mugic.Ability: Deal 10 damage to target Creature with Earth or Water.
mugic.Flavor Text: Forsake the land and the land will forsake you.

mugic.Name: Song of Mandiblor
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains 5 Courage, Power, Wisdom, and Speed for each Danian Creature in play.
mugic.Flavor Text: Listen and learn the true strength of the Danian tribe—when you face one, you contend with all.

mugic.Name: Song of Recovery
mugic.Ability: Heal 10 damage to target Creature. That Creature gains "Air 5."
mugic.Flavor Text: Tiaane believes that each Mugic is but a small piece of a great opus.

mugic.Name: Song of Resistance
mugic.Ability: Damage dealt by attacks to the caster is reduced by 5.
mugic.Flavor Text: Even the proudest Danian would never deny a chance to harden his shell.

mugic.Name: Song of Resurgence
mugic.Ability: Heal 20 damage to target Creature.
mugic.Flavor Text:
"Our understanding of Mugic is the direct inverse of our gratitude for its existence." 
—Najarin

mugic.Name: Song of Revival, (UnderWorld)
mugic.Ability: Return target UnderWorld Creature Card in your general discard pile to play to any unoccupied space on the Battleboard.
mugic.Flavor Text: The Mugicians believed that anything that once was cannot be lost forever.

mugic.Name: Song of Stasis
mugic.Ability: Target Creature cannot move.
mugic.Flavor Text: A melody has the power to move you... or not.

mugic.Name: Song of Surprisal
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains "Range" and "Swift 1."
mugic.Flavor Text: The usefulness of Mugic in battle is but a side effect. Its true purpose remains unknown.

mugic.Name: Song of Symmetry
mugic.Ability: Target engaged Creature gains 10 Energy. Deal 10 damage to another target engaged Creature.
mugic.Flavor Text: Your strength is now mine, my weakness is now yours!

mugic.Name: Song of Treachery
mugic.Ability: Target Creature loses 15 Courage, Power, Wisdom, and Speed.
mugic.Flavor Text: One cannot move forward if one's always watching one's own back.

mugic.Name: Song of Truesight
mugic.Ability: Target Creature loses Invisibility.
mugic.Flavor Text: A melody may help you see things more clearly, so how can sound be invisible?

mugic.Name: Trills of Diminution
mugic.Ability: Target engaged Creature loses all abilities.
mugic.Flavor Text: Even the simplest sounds can resonate in one's mind.

mugic.Name: Cascading Rondo
mugic.Ability: Swap your attack discard pile with your Attack Deck, then shuffle your Attack Deck.
mugic.Flavor Text: Though he appeared exhausted, he was merely getting his second wind.

mugic.Name: Casters' Warsong
mugic.Ability:
Deal 5 damage to target Creature.
If the caster of this Mugic is a Muge, deal an additional 10 damage.
mugic.Flavor Text: A sword can pierce the body, but a song can pierce the soul.

mugic.Name: Chorus of Cothica
mugic.Ability: Target Creature can play Mugic of any tribe.
mugic.Flavor Text: Some speak of the one true song, the Mugic that unites all Perim.

mugic.Name: Composition of Concentration
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains 30 in the Discipline of your choice.
mugic.Flavor Text: Mugic can raise the spirit to immeasurable heights.

mugic.Name: Danian Element Choral
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains all Elemental Types your Creatures have.
mugic.Flavor Text: Harmonies can never be sung alone.

mugic.Name: Defender's Song
mugic.Ability: Creatures you control gain "Defender."
mugic.Flavor Text: What inspires us to sacrifice ourselves for the ones that we love?

mugic.Name: Dissonance of Distraction
mugic.Ability: Target Creature loses 30 in the Discipline of your choice.
mugic.Flavor Text: Mugic can sink the spirit to immeasurable depths.

mugic.Name: Elemental Denial
mugic.Ability: Target Creature loses X Elemental Types of your choice.
mugic.Flavor Text: Some believe the Cothica and nature are irrevocably linked... understand one and rule the other!

mugic.Name: Elemental Elegy
mugic.Ability: Target Creature loses an Elemental Type of your choice. If that Creature has no Elemental Types, it cannot move instead.

mugic.Name: Forgotten Origins
mugic.Ability: Target player removes all cards in their general discard pile from the game.
mugic.Flavor Text: It was the most beautiful song I've ever heard... but now I can't even remember a single note.

mugic.Name: Gear Glissando
mugic.Ability: Flip target Battlegear face-up or face-down.
mugic.Flavor Text: Most Muges believe that the problem with machines is that they exist at all.

mugic.Name: Hive Destruction
mugic.Ability: Deactivate Hive.
mugic.Flavor Text: How absurd! The Danians act courageous, but they're merely thespians pretending to be warriors! We will rend their dirty hides into chaos!

mugic.Name: Hive Unsung
mugic.Ability:
Deactivate Hive.
When Hive Unsung is played, you can pay a Mugic counter. If you do, return Hive Unsung to your hand when it resolves.
mugic.Flavor Text: Some songs leave the audience in silence.

mugic.Name: Infectious Melody
mugic.Ability: Infect up to two target Uninfected Creatures.
mugic.Flavor Text: A tune so chilling that it makes your skin crawl.

mugic.Name: Melodic Might
mugic.Ability: Draw two Attack Cards, then discard two Attack Cards.
mugic.Flavor Text:
When Plan A fails, switch to Plan B. 
When Plan B fails... flee!

mugic.Name: Melody of the Meek
mugic.Ability: If target Creature with 30 or less Scanned Energy would take greater than 10 damage from a single source, it takes 10 damage instead.

mugic.Name: Momental Virtuosity
mugic.Ability:
Target Creature gains 50 in the Discipline of your choice.
Target Creature gains 50 in another Discipline of your choice.  (You can target the same Creature.)

mugic.Name: Prelude of Protection
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains "Fireproof 10", "Airproof 10", "Earthproof 10", and "Waterproof 10."
mugic.Flavor Text: Perhaps the Cothica is in the light, the land, the very winds that blow!

mugic.Name: Purge Dirge
mugic.Ability: Deal 5 damage to target Creature for each Mandiblor Creature you control and each Infected Creature in play, then Uninfect all Creatures.
mugic.Flavor Text: This may sting a little. But usually, a lot.

mugic.Name: Recurring Rescue
mugic.Ability:
Heal 10 damage to target Creature.
If the target of Recurring Rescue has 30 or less Scanned Energy, return Recurring Rescue to your hand when it resolves.
mugic.Flavor Text: Ahh... a song so soothing that OverWorlders yearn to hear it again and again.

mugic.Name: Serenade of Subordinance
mugic.Ability:
Target Creature loses 50 in the Discipline of your choice. 
Target Creature gains 50 in another Discipline of your choice. (You can target the same Creature.)

mugic.Name: Song of Encompassing
mugic.Ability: Creatures you control gain the Creature Type "Mandiblor" in addition to their other types.
mugic.Flavor Text: All I heard was the buzzing... the deafening, maddening buzzing!

mugic.Name: Song of Resilience
mugic.Ability: If target Creature has Fire, it gains "Fireproof 10"; if it has Air, it gains "Airproof 10"; if it has Earth, it gains "Earthproof 10"; if it has Water, it gains "Waterproof 10."

mugic.Name: Song of Shelter
mugic.Ability: Target Creature you control cannot be targeted by Mugic or abilities.
mugic.Flavor Text: How seven little notes can create such diverse wonders is one of the great, unsolvable mysteries of Perim.

mugic.Name: Switch Riff
mugic.Ability: Swap the spaces on the Battleboard of two target unengaged Mipedian Creatures you control.
mugic.Flavor Text: Beware if you see two sets of footprints... but only one Mipedian.

mugic.Name: Armament Adagio
mugic.Ability: Swap all Battlegear equipped to two target Creatures controlled by the same player.
mugic.Flavor Text: It's true that we can accomplish great feats alone, but together, we can accomplish miracles.

mugic.Name: Echoes of Empty Hands
mugic.Ability: Destroy all Battlegear equipped to target engaged Creature. That Creature gains 10 Energy.
mugic.Flavor Text:
"Even lifeless machines have a life force." 
—Vidav

mugic.Name: Fighters' Fanfare
mugic.Ability: The next time an attack would deal damage to a Creature this turn, it deals damage to target engaged Creature of your choice instead.
mugic.Flavor Text: The existence of Mugic is proof enough that nothing is impossible.

mugic.Name: Hymn of Teleportation
mugic.Ability:
Choose one:
Move target Mirage Location on the Battleboard to any place on the Battleboard. 
If the active Location is a Mirage, put it onto the Battleboard on any space and its owner reveals a new active Location.

mugic.Name: Melody of Parasitic Mayhem
mugic.Ability: Infect target Uninfected engaged Creature. If Hive is Active, Uninfect all Creatures controlled by an opponent and deal 5 damage to target engaged Creature for each Creature Uninfected this way instead.

mugic.Name: Rhyme of the Reckless
mugic.Ability: When target attack deals damage, deal the same amount of damage to the Creature that played that attack.
mugic.Flavor Text: The eyes show that which can be seen, but the ears reveal that which is real.

mugic.Name: Song of Desperation
mugic.Ability: Target engaged Creature gains 30 Energy. Discipline Checks and Challenges on attacks played by that Creature deal 0 damage.

mugic.Name: Song of the Dyad
mugic.Ability:
Choose one: 
Heal 10 damage to target Creature.
Deal 10 damage to target Creature.
mugic.Flavor Text: What brings happiness to one brings pain to another.

mugic.Name: Strain of Ash
mugic.Ability: Sacrifice a Battlegear equipped to an unengaged UnderWorld Creature you control. If you do, destroy target Battlegear.
mugic.Flavor Text: As his Ice Cloak vanished, Bodal calculated he had 8.5 seconds until the firestorm immolated him.

mugic.Name: Strain of Clarity
mugic.Ability:
Choose one: 
Shuffle target Mirage Location into its controller's Location Deck.
If the active Location is a Mirage, shuffle it into its controller's Location deck and that player reveals a new active Location.

mugic.Name: Strain of Expensive Delusions
mugic.Ability: Destroy all Battlegear equipped to Creatures in the same space as target Mirage.  Shuffle that Mirage into its controller's Location Deck.

mugic.Name: Strain of Infection
mugic.Ability: Uninfect up to three Infected Creatures. Put a Mugic counter on target Danian Creature for each Creature Uninfected by Strain of Infection this way.
mugic.Flavor Text: Little parasites, big rewards.

mugic.Name: Strain of the Tide
mugic.Ability: Remove any number of OverWorld Creatures in your general discard pile from the game. Heal 10 damage to target Creature for each card you remove this way.

mugic.Name: Tune of Xerium
mugic.Ability: Sacrifice a Battlegear. If you do, return another Battlegear from your general discard pile to play equipped to an unequipped Creature you control.

mugic.Name: Void Dirge
mugic.Ability: Remove up to three target cards in one general discard pile from the game.
mugic.Flavor Text: Do not dwell on the past. What's lost is best forgotten.

mugic.Name: Allegro
mugic.Ability:
Target Creature gains 50 Speed.
The caster pays 2 less mugic counters to play this Mugic if an engaged creature you control won Initiative this turn.
mugic.Flavor Text: Even with Spectral Viewers, the invasion squad could no longer find the elusive Mipedians.

mugic.Name: Aria of Enragement
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains "Recklessness 5."
mugic.Flavor Text:
"Be gone, you fool! The Cothica won't save Perim! Look at the devastation even a hint of its power can cause!" 
—Sobtjek

mugic.Name: Ballad of the Belittled
mugic.Ability: Deal 20 damage to target Creature that has no Disciplines greater than 25.
mugic.Flavor Text: Always pick off the weak before they grow up and pick you off

mugic.Name: Cadence Clash
mugic.Ability: Negate target Mugic and return that card to its controller's hand.
mugic.Flavor Text: There is nothing worse for a Muge than the stunning sound of silence.

mugic.Name: Carnivore's Keening
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains 30 Energy and "Recklessness 10."
mugic.Flavor Text:
"This is where we draw the line! Protect the Riverlands!" 
—Tartarek

mugic.Name: Chromatic Postlude
mugic.Ability: Deal 5 damage to target Creature for each Mugic counter spent to play Chromatic Postlude.
mugic.Flavor Text:
"What you call 'overkill' is what I call 'being thorough.'" 
—Takinom

mugic.Name: Deep Dirge
mugic.Ability: Target Minion Creature is treated as if that Creature's controller also controlled a Chieftain.
mugic.Flavor Text: As his eyes glazed over, all he could think was, "Obey, obey, obey."

mugic.Name: Desert's Wrathsong
mugic.Ability: Destroy target Creature with 0 Speed and 0 Power.
mugic.Flavor Text: Under the burning sun, even the hardiest desiccate in a matter of minutes.

mugic.Name: Deserter's Finale
mugic.Ability: Deal 5 damage to target Creature. Deal an additional 10 damage to it if it has Water.
mugic.Flavor Text:
"The fire of the UnderWorld will burn forever!" 
—Chaor

mugic.Name: Disarming Theme
mugic.Ability: Target Creature with Invisibility gains "Invisibility: Disarm."
mugic.Flavor Text: Each time Tangath tried to pick up his blade his unseen foe knocked it away again.

mugic.Name: Dissonance of Will
mugic.Ability: Negate target activated Creature ability.
mugic.Flavor Text: Mugic, like memory, is fleeting.

mugic.Name: Domestic Hive Hymn
mugic.Ability:
Target Creature gains 10 Energy.
If Hive is active, that Creature gains an additional 10 Energy.
mugic.Flavor Text: With my hive family, I am more "we" than "me."

mugic.Name: Draining Dirge
mugic.Ability: Heal 15 damage to target Mandiblor Creature.
mugic.Flavor Text: Though Mandiblors are treated as the dregs of society, Queen Illexia loves all her children equally.

mugic.Name: Duality Dirge
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains or loses Courage, Power, Wisdom and Speed to make its Disciplines equal to its Scanned Disciplines and cannot be targeted by Mugic or abilities.

mugic.Name: Ecstatic Fanfare
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains 20 Wisdom, 15 Courage, 10 Speed and 5 Power.
mugic.Flavor Text: Najarin found it more interesting than prophetic that he had seven letters in his name.

mugic.Name: Effervescent Etude
mugic.Ability: Deal 15 damage to target M'arrillian Creature.
mugic.Flavor Text: Melodies to some, noise to others.

mugic.Name: Empowering Serenade
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains 10 Energy and 10 Wisdom.
mugic.Flavor Text:
"We all fail, my friend. But how we respond to failure - now that is the sign of a champion." 
—Maxxor

mugic.Name: Etude of Exhaustion
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains "Exhaust all Disciplines 5."
mugic.Flavor Text: As the battle dragged on from days to weeks, the battalion lost the will to keep fighting.

mugic.Name: Falsetto
mugic.Ability: Target Creature loses 20 Power, 15 Speed, 10 Courage and 5 Wisdom.
mugic.Flavor Text:
Before: Chaor 
After: H'earring

mugic.Name: Fanfare of the Brain
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains 25 Courage and 25 Wisdom. If the target is a Minion Creature, it gains another 25 Courage and 25 Wisdom.

mugic.Name: Fatiguing Falsetto
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains "Exhaust all Disciplines 15."
mugic.Flavor Text:
"If you have patience, you can win a war without fighting a single battle." 
—Vidav's teachings

mugic.Name: Final Fugue
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains 15 Energy and "Recklessness 5."
mugic.Flavor Text: With adrenaline pumping through his veins, Ragetrod hardly felt a thing when he rammed headfirst through three stone pillars.

mugic.Name: Fluidmorpher's Fanfare
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains "Water 5", put a Mugic counter on it.
mugic.Flavor Text:
"Defeat the enemy from within. When they no longer know whom to trust, they'll crumble on their own!" 
—Phelphor

mugic.Name: Improvisational Melody
mugic.Ability:
Deal 10 damage to target Creature.
The caster pays 2 less mugic counters to play this Mugic if an engaged creature you control dealt 20 or more attack damage this turn.

mugic.Name: Intense Polyphony
mugic.Ability:
Activate Hive.
The caster pays 2 less mugic counters to play this Mugic if an engaged creature you control has taken 15 or more attack damage this turn.
mugic.Flavor Text: Against the Danians, there is no such thing as a one-on-one fight.

mugic.Name: Melody of Miracles
mugic.Ability:
Heal 15 damage to target Creature.
The caster pays 2 less mugic counters to play this Mugic if an engaged creature you control won a Wisdom Challenge this turn.

mugic.Name: Melody of Mirrored Actions
mugic.Ability: Destroy target Battlegear equipped to an engaged Creature.
mugic.Flavor Text: Mugic is a sword that pierces invulnerable armor, a shield that blocks unstoppable strikes.

mugic.Name: Nourishing Nocturne
mugic.Ability: Sacrifice a Minion Creature. If you do, target engaged Creature gains Energy equal to the Scanned Energy of the sacrificed Creature.
mugic.Flavor Text: I know you think you gave it your all, but I bet I can coax out a little more.

mugic.Name: Odd Opus
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains 15 Energy and 15 to all Disciplines.
mugic.Flavor Text: When a mere seven notes can change the course of history, that is the very definition of a miracle.

mugic.Name: Predator's Song
mugic.Ability: Sacrifice an unengaged Creature. If you do, target engaged Creature loses X from each Discipline where X is the sacrificed Creature's Scanned Disciplines. If you sacrificed a Minion Creature, engaged Creatures also lose 10 Energy.

mugic.Name: Prelude to Dominance
mugic.Ability: Deal 10 damage to target Creature.
mugic.Flavor Text: Strike first, strike fast, strike hard, strike last.

mugic.Name: Psionic Serenade
mugic.Ability: Remove a Minion Creature Card in your general discard pile from the game. If you do, deal damage to target engaged Creature equal to the removed card's Scanned Energy.

mugic.Name: Rhythms of Rage
mugic.Ability: Target Mandiblor Creature gains "Outperform Courage 5." If it is Infected, it gains "Earth 5." If Hive is active, it also gains 15 Energy.

mugic.Name: Selective Strain
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains 25 to a Discipline of your choice. That Creature loses 25 to another Discipline of your choice.
mugic.Flavor Text: Every up has a down, every left has a right. The Cothica is always in balance.

mugic.Name: Song of Stable Shields
mugic.Ability: Target Creature's Disciplines cannot be increased or decreased.
mugic.Flavor Text: If every counter has a counter, what can we count on?

mugic.Name: Specific Diminishing
mugic.Ability: Target Creature loses 20 to a Discipline of your choice.
mugic.Flavor Text:
When the wise become dumb 
Or the fast become slow 
They've already lost 
And they don't even know

mugic.Name: Surprising Riffs
mugic.Ability: Flip target Battlegear face-down.
mugic.Flavor Text: Unfortunately for Gronmar, his Telebracers sputtered and died seconds before the toxic tidal wave struck him full force.

mugic.Name: Symphony of Similarity
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains 5 to all Disciplines for each Mandiblor Creature you control and each Infected Creature in play.

mugic.Name: Tonal Destruction
mugic.Ability: Your opponent reveals X Mugic Cards from their hand and you choose one of them. Your opponent discards the chosen card.
mugic.Flavor Text: If you eliminate the cause, you'll never face the consequences.

mugic.Name: Calling of Aa'une
mugic.Ability: If Aa'une the Oligarch, Projection won combat this turn while equipped with Baton of Aa'une and Rage of Aa'une was played by a Creature you control this turn, flip over Aa'une the Oligarch, Projection.

mugic.Name: Curemorph Chords
mugic.Ability: Heal 20 damage to target Fluidmorpher Creature.
mugic.Flavor Text: It was hardly fair. As their mortal wounds instantly healed, the irresistible force became even more unstoppable.

mugic.Name: Decelerating Requiem
mugic.Ability: Destroy target Creature with 0 Speed.
mugic.Flavor Text: As his pulse plummeted, his heart beat slower... slower... and fell silent.

mugic.Name: Denial Refrain of the Deep
mugic.Ability: Negate target Mugic.
mugic.Flavor Text: When Bodal realized that only four of his seven notes played, he calculated that he only had 2.5 seconds until Erak'tabb's tentacle squished him like an overripe djobwon.

mugic.Name: Harmonies of the Wind
mugic.Ability: Target M'arrillian or Minion Creature cannot move or play activated abilities.
mugic.Flavor Text: When Perim is at its darkest, the Cothica lights the path of hope.

mugic.Name: Intress' Healing Ballad
mugic.Ability: Heal 5 damage to target engaged Creature for each Mugic counter on opposing Creatures.

mugic.Name: Kopond's Composition
mugic.Ability: Deal 5 damage to target engaged Creature for each Mugic counter on opposing Creatures.

mugic.Name: Mightsinger's Requiem
mugic.Ability: Destroy target Creature with 0 Power.
mugic.Flavor Text: When a pebble becomes as heavy as a boulder, your life will soon be over.

mugic.Name: Mindproof March
mugic.Ability: Heal 5 damage to target Creature and deal 5 damage to another target Creature for each Danian Creature you control with Water.

mugic.Name: Requiem of Fear
mugic.Ability: Destroy target Creature with 0 Courage.
mugic.Flavor Text: There is no need to fight if your foe is in flight!

mugic.Name: Requiem of Lost Minds
mugic.Ability: Destroy target Creature with 0 Wisdom.
mugic.Flavor Text: A word to the wise: the wise need no words.

mugic.Name: Sound of Noise
mugic.Ability: Negate target M'arrillian or Generic Mugic.
mugic.Flavor Text: The silence was deafening.

mugic.Name: Unheard Melody
mugic.Ability: Destroy target Creature with no Mugic counters on it.
mugic.Flavor Text: Who knows why Mugicians exist. Just be thankful they do.

mugic.Name: Vexing Waveform
mugic.Ability:
Target Creature gains "Recklessness 5."
When Vexing Waveform is played you can pay an additional 2 Mugic counters. If you do, the target Creature gains an additional "Recklessness 5."

mugic.Name: Armament Alteration Anthem
mugic.Ability: Destroy all Battlegear equipped to engaged Creatures. Then, if you only control Mipedian Creatures and your engaged creature is unequipped, return a Battlegear Card from your general discard pile to play equipped to your engaged Creature.

mugic.Name: Choral of the Apparition
mugic.Ability: Sacrifice an unengaged Mandiblor Creature. If you do, return target Danian Creature Card from your general discard pile to play to the space on the Battleboard where the sacrificed Mandiblor was. If you control only Danian Creatures, return it to any unoccupied space on the Battleboard instead.

mugic.Name: Dirge of the Desert
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains "Invisibility: Surprise" and "Invisibility: Strike 10."
mugic.Flavor Text: The desert wind erases footprints, making the invisible even more undetectable.

mugic.Name: Fanfare of Elemental Champions
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains an Elemental Type of your choice. If you control only OverWorld Creatures, that Creature also gains "Element 5" of the chosen Elemental Type.

mugic.Name: Harmonious Highsong
mugic.Ability: Heal 30 damage to target Creature. If you control only OverWorld Creatures, it gains 30 Energy instead.
mugic.Flavor Text:
"I know enough about Mugic to know that I know very little indeed." 
—Najarin

mugic.Name: Intimidating Melody of M'arr
mugic.Ability: Target engaged Creature loses 30 to all Disciplines.
mugic.Flavor Text: As sudden fatigue overwhelmed his body, Bodal calculated that he had 4.3 seconds to escape before he became Milla'iin's appetizer.

mugic.Name: Katharaz's Cacophony
mugic.Ability: Heal 5 damage to your engaged Creature for each Elemental Type it has. If you control only Danian Creatures, also deal 5 damage to the opposing engaged Creature for each Elemental Type that Creature has.

mugic.Name: March of the M'arrillian Minions
mugic.Ability: Put 2 Mugic counters on target Minion Creature.
mugic.Flavor Text: With thousands of different Creatures having millions of unique talents, Aa'une has infinite methods to abuse and exploit them.

mugic.Name: Minion's Freesong
mugic.Ability: Target Minion Creature is treated as if its controller did not also control a Chieftain.
mugic.Flavor Text:
"If we fail to rescue our friends soon, we will never turn back the tide." 
—Maxxor

mugic.Name: Nocturne of the Elements
mugic.Ability: Target opposing engaged Creature loses all Elemental Types. If you control only UnderWorld Creatures, deal 5 damage to it for each Elemental Type lost this way.

mugic.Name: Roar of the Mob
mugic.Ability: Deal 10 damage to target Creature for each Mugic counter on it.
mugic.Flavor Text: It was a sound I never heard before. As if the Mugicians were screaming in pain.

mugic.Name: Shock Song
mugic.Ability: Deal 10 damage to target Creature. If you control only UnderWorld Creatures, also destroy all Battlegear equipped to it.
mugic.Flavor Text: Achieving the impossible is simple... as long as you know which seven notes to play.

mugic.Name: Symphonic Pelagic Maresong
mugic.Ability: Mugic and activated abilities cannot be played. (Mugic and activated abilities played before this resolves are unaffected.)
mugic.Flavor Text: The tune died, as did any chance of reclaiming the Riverlands.

mugic.Name: Symphony of the Guard
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains "Earth 5" and "Air 5." If you only control Mipedian Creatures, it also gains "Outperform Speed 5."
mugic.Flavor Text: Never forget your roots. All answers lie there.

mugic.Name: Unisong
mugic.Ability: Target Danian Creature gains 10 Energy. If Hive is active, it also gains 10 Courage for each Danian Creature you control.
mugic.Flavor Text: Unite and fight... or divide and die!

mugic.Name: Adaptive Progression
mugic.Ability: Negate target Elemental Attack.

mugic.Name: Denying Dirge
mugic.Ability: Target Creature cannot be healed or gain Energy.
mugic.Flavor Text: If you make sure the weak remain weak, the outcome will never be bleak.

mugic.Name: Iflar's Improvisation
mugic.Ability: Target non-Mipedian Creature gains "Invisibility: Strike 30."
mugic.Flavor Text:
"A secret shared can never be unshared... but so be it." 
—Prince Iflar

mugic.Name: Illusion Glissando
mugic.Ability: Relocate target Mirage Location to any space on the Battleboard.
mugic.Flavor Text: As they wandered from sand dune to sand dune in search of the Cothica, little did they know that the Cothica was never there to begin with.

mugic.Name: Intertwined Melody
mugic.Ability: Target Creature engaged with a non-UnderWorld Creature you control loses an Elemental Type of your choice and loses 30 to all Disciplines.
mugic.Flavor Text:
"I never thought an UnderWorlder would save my life. I owe you... unfortunately." 
—Gespedan

mugic.Name: Jig of Reinforcement
mugic.Ability:
Target Creature gains:
10 Energy if it is an OverWorld Creature.
"Fire 5" if it is an UnderWorld Creature.
20 to all Disciplines if it is a Danian Creature.
"Invisibility: Strike 10" if it is a Mipedian Creature.

mugic.Name: Monophone Mayhem
mugic.Ability: Choose a Tribe. Creatures of that Tribe cannot have Mugic counters put on them.
mugic.Flavor Text: The Mugician's singing turned into screams. There will be no more music this day.

mugic.Name: Ode to Obscurity
mugic.Ability: Infect X Uninfected Creatures. If you control a non-Danian Creature, Infect another X Uninfected Creatures.
mugic.Flavor Text: Where most see the tragedies of war, the wise see opportunity.

mugic.Name: Opus Opposed
mugic.Ability: Heal 5 damage to target Creature for each Tribe you control.
mugic.Flavor Text:
One is none. 
Two may do. 
Three? Maybe. 
But four... we soar!

mugic.Name: Ostinato of Oban'emre
mugic.Ability: Target M'arrillian or Minion Creature gains 10 Energy for each Minion Creature Card in each general discard pile.
mugic.Flavor Text: Living in harsh waters, the M'arrillians learned to scrounge even the smallest shred to survive.

mugic.Name: Skysong Arpeggio
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains 30 Wisdom and "Outperform Wisdom 5."
mugic.Flavor Text: As Milla'iin fell into his lava trap, Bodal calculated that it would boil into a yummy seafood soup in 32.8 seconds.

mugic.Name: Vidav's Voicing
mugic.Ability: Target non-OverWorld Creature gains 20 Energy.
mugic.Flavor Text:
"There are seven tenets to victory, and it is no coincidence that seven notes are the keys to each." 
—Vidav's teachings

mugic.Name: Aegis Airia
mugic.Ability: Negate target attack. The next attack played this turn deals 0 damage.
mugic.Flavor Text: Each note a melody, each melody an aria, each aria a symphony, each symphony a miracle.

mugic.Name: Ancestral Anthem
mugic.Ability: Remove a Creature Card in your general discard pile from the game. If you do, activate Hive.
mugic.Flavor Text: Resourceful and efficient, Danians recycle everything in order to survive... including corpses!

mugic.Name: Anthem of Stone
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains Earth. If that Creature already has Earth, it gains "Earth 5" instead.
mugic.Flavor Text: The earth split, toppling the towers, erasing the castle from memory.

mugic.Name: Battlesong of Depletion
mugic.Ability: Creatures engaged with the caster lose all Elemental Types.
mugic.Flavor Text: Isolated from the embrace of the universe, Heptadd felt alone, empty and - for the first time - afraid.

mugic.Name: Battlesong of Renewal
mugic.Ability: Caster heals 25 Damage.
mugic.Flavor Text: The search for the Cothica is also a search into yourself. You cannot find one without the other.

mugic.Name: Bonding Battlesong
mugic.Ability: When target opposing Creature heals or gains Energy from a Mugic or activated ability, the caster of this Mugic also heals or gains that much Energy.

mugic.Name: Consuming Cacophony
mugic.Ability: Deal 20 damage to target Creature. If the caster of this Mugic has Fire, deal an additional 10 damage.
mugic.Flavor Text: Flames feed upon flames in a voracious conflagration.

mugic.Name: Counterpoint of Chaos
mugic.Ability: Target Creature cannot gain Elemental Types.
mugic.Flavor Text: Once again, "Mugic Tester" ranked as the second most dangerous job in Perim... just behind Chaor's sparring partner.

mugic.Name: Decomposition
mugic.Ability: Target Creature fails all Discipline checks on attacks it plays.
mugic.Flavor Text:
His strength faltered 
His bravery waned 
His feet dragged 
As we went insane

mugic.Name: Diminuendo
mugic.Ability: Target Creature loses 5 Energy and 5 to all Disciplines.
mugic.Flavor Text: Aivenna dug deep, willing herself to keep fighting... but her body had nothing left to give.

mugic.Name: Dischord of Flame
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains Fire. If that Creature already has Fire, it gains "Fire 5" instead.
mugic.Flavor Text: The grey coat of ash choked the petals, wilting the leaves, wilting the soul.

mugic.Name: Elemental Counterpoint
mugic.Ability: Target attack deals 10 less damage for each Elemental Type that attack has.
mugic.Flavor Text:
"You call that a Pebblestorm?! That was more like a Pebblebreeze!" 
—Wamma

mugic.Name: Elemental Denial
mugic.Ability: Target Creature loses X Elemental Types of your choice.
mugic.Flavor Text: Some believe the Cothica and nature are irrevocably linked... understand one and rule the other!

mugic.Name: Empowering Encore
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains all Elemental Types your Creature Cards in your general discard pile have.
mugic.Flavor Text:
"As long as you believe that the impossible is only what has yet to be accomplished, everything is possible." 
—Lore

mugic.Name: Fluid Fugue
mugic.Ability: Heal 25 damage to target Creature. If the caster of this Mugic has Water, also put a Mugic counter on the target Creature.
mugic.Flavor Text: Seven notes... infinite possibilities.

mugic.Name: Gear Glissando
mugic.Ability: Flip target Battlegear face-up or face-down.
mugic.Flavor Text: Most Muges believe that the problem with machines is that they exist at all.

mugic.Name: Harmonics of Water
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains Water. If that Creature already has Water, it gains "Water 5" instead.
mugic.Flavor Text: And with one final wave, the flood washed away all remaining traces of the now-forgotten civilization.

mugic.Name: Howl of the Wind
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains Air. If that Creature already has Air, it gains "Air 5" instead.
mugic.Flavor Text: The tornado ripped across the fields, destroying the harvest, starving the land.

mugic.Name: Interlude of Interruption
mugic.Ability: Negate target Mugic unless the caster pays an additional Mugic counter.
mugic.Flavor Text: When the Mugicians sing, all of Perim is blessed.

mugic.Name: Rocky Refrain
mugic.Ability: Target engaged Creature gains 5 Energy for each Elemental Type the opposing engaged Creature has. If the caster of this Mugic has Earth, the target Creature gains an additional 5 Energy for each Elemental Type the opposing engaged Creature has.

mugic.Name: Searing Symphony
mugic.Ability: Deal 10 damage to target Creature for each Elemental Type it has.
mugic.Flavor Text: The rain not only nourishes but drowns. The embers warm as well as burn.

mugic.Name: Silent Requiem
mugic.Ability: Negate target Mugic or ability that targets a Creature with Invisibility.
mugic.Flavor Text: Unseen, unheard, unhittable... unbeatable!

mugic.Name: Sonata of Storms
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains "Range" and "Swift 3." If the caster of this Mugic has Air, the target Creature also gains "Invisibility: Surprise."
mugic.Flavor Text: As the thief sped away, Gespedan blamed himself for leaving the battle plans out in the open.

mugic.Name: Song of the Dyad
mugic.Ability:
Choose one: 
Heal 10 damage to target Creature.
Deal 10 damage to target Creature.
mugic.Flavor Text: What brings happiness to one brings pain to another.

mugic.Name: Song of Elemental Attunement
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains all of its Scanned Elemental Types.
mugic.Flavor Text:
"As ice, liquid and vapor are different forms of water, the four elements are simply different forms of nature." 
—Intress

mugic.Name: Song of Translocation
mugic.Ability: Relocate target Creature you control to any unoccupied space on the Battleboard.
mugic.Flavor Text:
"There's no shame in losing a fight. There's only shame in losing your life." 
—Headmaster Ankhyja

mugic.Name: Swartbron Battlesong
mugic.Ability: If the caster is engaged, the opposing engaged Creature and the caster each gain Energy equal to their lowest Discipline.
mugic.Flavor Text: In a maddening gyre, delving into the secrets of Mugic only reveals more secrets.

mugic.Name: Symphony of Shielding
mugic.Ability: Target attack or Mugic deals 0 damage.
mugic.Flavor Text: As Maxxor fearlessly charged through the rain of flaming arrows, he added another tale to his legend.

mugic.Name: Unbalancing Battlesong
mugic.Ability: Caster gains 15 Energy and Creatures engaged with caster lose 15 Energy.
mugic.Flavor Text:
"Mugic is older than time and stronger than power. It will outlast us all." 
—Tharc

mugic.Name: Mondo Rondo
mugic.Ability: Target attack counts as the first attack played this combat.
mugic.Flavor Text: "Stop me if you've heard this one before" - Enre-hep

mugic.Name: Stereostrike
mugic.Ability: Destroy two target Battlegear.
mugic.Flavor Text: Seven notes. Unparalleled destruction.

mugic.Name: Najarin's Tower of Song
mugic.Ability:
Deal 20 damage to target Creature on your side of the Battleboard.
That Creature's controller discards a random Mugic Card from their hand.

mugic.Name: Ulmar's Activating Arpeggio
mugic.Ability: Flip target face-down Battlegear face-up. Destroy that Battlegear at the beginning of the next turn.

mugic.Name: Fortissimo (OP)
mugic.Ability: Target Creature gains 5 Courage, Power, Wisdom, Speed, and Energy.
mugic.Flavor Text:
"The Cothica existed before the beginning. It will survive long past our end." 
—Najarin

mugic.Name: Song of Transportation (Datamined)
mugic.Ability: Reveal a new active Location.
mugic.Flavor Text: The shortest distance between two points is not always a straight line

mugic.Name: Swarm Song (Datamined)
mugic.Ability: Deal 15 damage to target Creature.
mugic.Flavor Text: The insects eclipsed the sun, turning day into night

mugic.Name: Refrain of Denial
mugic.Ability: Negate target Mugic.
mugic.Flavor Text: Cacophony signaled the beginning of the end of peace for the Mugicians.

mugic.Name: Song of Revival, (UnderWorld)
mugic.Ability: Return target UnderWorld Creature Card in your general discard pile to play to any unoccupied space on the Battleboard.
mugic.Flavor Text: The Mugicians believed that anything that once was cannot be lost forever.

mugic.Name: Chorus of Cothica
mugic.Ability: Target Creature can play Mugic of any tribe.
mugic.Flavor Text: Some speak of the one true song, the Mugic that unites all Perim.

mugic.Name: Elemental Elegy
mugic.Ability: Target Creature loses an Elemental Type of your choice. If that Creature has no Elemental Types, it cannot move instead.

mugic.Name: Fighters' Fanfare
mugic.Ability: The next time an attack would deal damage to a Creature this turn, it deals damage to target engaged Creature of your choice instead.
mugic.Flavor Text: The existence of Mugic is proof enough that nothing is impossible.
